ai-atk-s0404a9:1_1: Then, after death, a lay follower of Bojjhā ...
ai-atk-s0404a9:1_3: but there is nothing bigger than that.
ai-atk-s0404a9:2_0: The Visākha are running errands and messages for the Nuns
ai-atk-s0404a9:3_0: The Book of the Eights is finished.
ai-atk-s0404a9:4_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
